channel.title: EmbodiedPKz | UNDER DEVELOPMENT |
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/e5l72v.png[/img] SERVER IS: ONLINE!
- EmbodiedPKz is a 317 server with some customs and some unique features. - The server is still being made at the moment and can be using some more coding help being that i'm new to coding. - If you wanna see some of the features that have been added to the server go to the Homepage and Forums! The Homepage is being changed day-by-day. - You can register at: [URL=http://"http://embodiedrsps.webs.com"]EmbodiedPKz homepage![/URL] - Webclient up now! - [URL=http://"www.rswebclients.com/play/EmbodiedPKz"]Webclient![/URL]
[Media] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2nune3n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/k2t6q.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hzmt5z.jpg[/img]
Since there ain't much activity on my forums i'll just post some of the stuff I updated each day. June 23rd: - Fixed the bug where people that would join the server and wouldn't receive a Starter Pack. - Fixed the teleports, There was no way to teleport at all (unless you were Donator+ and could go to Donator Zone) [Now there's Monster teleports, Minigame/Boss teleports, and Skilling teleports] - Changed the home to Shanty Pass, It's smaller and less spread apart and easier to get your things and go! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ~ Working on adding a "Bank-All" option while in the bank. ~ Working on adding a Slayer point system and a Shop to go along with it. (Will make tasks more challenging) ~ Working on adding NPCs to the Monster teleports. ~ Working on fixing Skilling areas. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [Media Updates] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2aj47dd.jpg[/img] This is the Starter Package (Just for testing)^ [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fp8owz.jpg[/img] These are the 3 teleport options that are currently available, I'll be adding more eventually. ^ [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2zrhtok.jpg[/img] This is the current home. I don't like it so i'll change it eventually.
Note: A large amount of the content which is out now is for people to use during testing. and I would like it if you guys would help me by telling me about some of the bugs you guys see, and even suggestions to make the server a better place and more like-able for other players. Once the server is finish and is to my liking I'll reset everyone's account so people that we're helping me test don't have any advantages over the other players. If you donate. you'll be a Donator through-out testing and once the server is online, i'll keep your account but reset everything to 1 and strip you of your items.
Thanks guys!

item.title: EmbodiedPKz | UNDER DEVELOPMENT |

item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I can see a few bugs just from your pictures. Don’t use this source.

item.title: EmbodiedPKz | UNDER DEVELOPMENT |
item.dc:creator: @embodiedpkz embodiedpkz
item.description:
@embodiedpkz wrote:


SERVER IS: ONLINE!

  • EmbodiedPKz is a 317 server with some customs and some unique features.
  • The server is still being made at the moment and can be using some more coding help being that i’m new to coding.
  • If you wanna see some of the features that have been added to the server go to the Homepage and Forums!
    The Homepage is being changed day-by-day.
  • You can register at: EmbodiedPKz homepage!
  • Webclient up now! - Webclient!

[Media]


Since there ain’t much activity on my forums i’ll just post some of the stuff I updated each day.
June 23rd:

  • Fixed the bug where people that would join the server and wouldn’t receive a Starter Pack.
  • Fixed the teleports, There was no way to teleport at all (unless you were Donator+ and could go to Donator Zone)
    [Now there’s Monster teleports, Minigame/Boss teleports, and Skilling teleports]
  • Changed the home to Shanty Pass, It’s smaller and less spread apart and easier to get your things and go!

~ Working on adding a “Bank-All” option while in the bank.
~ Working on adding a Slayer point system and a Shop to go along with it. (Will make tasks more challenging)
~ Working on adding NPCs to the Monster teleports.
~ Working on fixing Skilling areas.

[Media Updates]

This is the Starter Package (Just for testing)^

These are the 3 teleport options that are currently available, I’ll be adding more eventually. ^

This is the current home. I don’t like it so i’ll change it eventually.

Note: A large amount of the content which is out now is for people to use during testing. and I would like it if you guys would help me by telling me about some of the bugs you guys see, and even suggestions to make the server a better place and more like-able for other players.
Once the server is finish and is to my liking I’ll reset everyone’s account so people that we’re helping me test don’t have any advantages over the other players. If you donate. you’ll be a Donator through-out testing and once the server is online, i’ll keep your account but reset everything to 1 and strip you of your items.

Thanks guys!

Read full topic
